title: Tran - ut Romam videas - Martha Marchina

content.description:
Ut Romam videas, praecepspraeceps, -cipitis, adj.: straightaway perque a via curris; 
iam potes hic Romam cernerecerno, -ere = video, -ere, sistesisto, -ere = subsisto, -ere gradum.
content.question: In the passage, Ut Romam videas is translated

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
